医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
昆士兰大学的研究可能会带来更有效的膀胱癌治疗方法昆士兰大学的研究可能会带来更有效的膀胱癌免疫疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UQ-research-could-lead-to-a-more- effective-treatment-for-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UQ-research-could-lead-to-a-more-efficient-treatment-for-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793e1b2a-f550-4c0c-b006-b3e7b9cff1df Tue, 20 Aug 2024 23:50:00 -0400 UQ research could lead to a more effective treatment for bladder cancer
新型荧光探针提供嗅觉丧失的非侵入性检测一种新的荧光成像探针首次可以客观、非侵入性地测量嗅觉丧失，临床上称为嗅觉丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/New-florescent-probe-offers-non-pressive-detection-of-smell-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/New-florescent-probe-offers-non-pressive-detection-of-smell-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c88fe87-072b-42b9-a8aa-990eb47b4497 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 23:31:00 -0400 New fluorescent probe offers non-invasive detection of smell loss
工程心脏组织揭示了狼疮相关心脏损伤的新机制心血管疾病是狼疮患者死亡的主要原因，狼疮是一种自身免疫性疾病，我们的免疫系统攻击我们自己的组织和器官，包括心脏、血液、肺、关节、大脑和皮肤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Engineered-heart-tissues-uncover-new-mechanisms-in-lupus-lated-heart-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Engineered-heart-tissues-uncover-new-mechanisms-in-lupus-lated-heart-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a84919-a07b-4725-a0ed-45cd0533cbcf Tue, 20 Aug 2024 23:27:00 -0400 Engineered heart tissues uncover new mechanisms in lupus-related heart damage
加州大学戴维斯分校的研究人员揭示了沙门氏菌入侵肠道的途径坏细菌如何找到体内的入口点并引起感染？这个问题对于传染病专家和研究细菌的人来说是至关重要的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UC-Davis-researchers-unveil-pathway-for-Salmonellas-gut-invasion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UC-Davis-researchers-unveil-pathway-for-Salmonellas-gut-invasion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c540d6b-c4f8-4e67-bf5f-4ae2aa08544c Tue, 20 Aug 2024 23:03:48 -0400 UC Davis researchers unveil pathway for Salmonella's gut invasion
新的基因组技术可追踪医院中的超级细菌，以加快感染管理速度研究人员开发了一种新的基因组技术，可以同时追踪医院内多种超级细菌的传播，这有助于比以往更快、更有效地预防和管理常见的医院感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/New-genomic-technique-tracks-superbugs-in-hospitals-for-faster-infection-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/New-genomic-technique-tracks-superbugs-in-hospitals-for-faster-infection-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3210c3e-0314-432a-901e-2e1cbd015d5f Tue, 20 Aug 2024 22:52:36 -0400 New genomic technique tracks superbugs in hospitals for faster infection management
研究强调 20 分钟正念呼吸对癌症患者的好处《BMJ 支持与姑息治疗》杂志在线发表的一项小型比较研究的结果表明，20 分钟的正念呼吸（将人的注意力集中在呼吸上）可以迅速减轻癌症疼痛的强度和不愉快感，并缓解相关的焦虑。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Study-highlights-benefits-of-20-minute-mindful-breathing-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Study-highlights-benefits-of-20-minute-mindful-breathing-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f03a081-a9d2-43f2-bba9-442acfbda2f9 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 22:41:27 -0400 Study highlights benefits of 20-minute mindful breathing for cancer patients
肠道微生物群的发现为新的心力衰竭治疗铺平了道路克利夫兰诊所的研究人员在肠道微生物组如何与细胞相互作用导致心血管疾病方面取得了重大发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Gut-microbiome-discovery-paves-the-way-for-new-heart-failure-treatments-Cleveland-Clinic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Gut-microbiome-discovery-paves-the-way-for-new-heart-failure-treatments-Cleveland-Clinic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25e041de-76b9-431c-8de7-319b135e6934 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 22:37:00 -0400 Gut microbiome discovery paves the way for new heart failure treatments
盒中心脏技术提高了心脏移植的成功率如果将供体心脏储存在所谓的盒装心脏中，而不是通常的加冰的冷藏箱中，那么心脏移植后发生早期心力衰竭的风险就会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Heart-in-a-box-technology-enhances-success-of-heart-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Heart-in-a-box-technology-enhances-success-of-heart-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7956f38-56ac-4e97-bfb6-7f2025762198 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 22:30:00 -0400 Heart-in-a-box technology enhances success of heart transplants
了解精神障碍中大脑网络和认知缺陷之间的联系根据新的研究，精神分裂症和双相情感障碍等精神障碍的认知障碍与大脑网络组织有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Understanding-the-connection- Between-brain-networks-and-cognitive-deficits-in-psychotic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Understanding-the-connection- Between-brain-networks-and-cognitive-deficits-in-psychotic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc3e3753-7182-400d-a6e3-0a4ea34fcaac Tue, 20 Aug 2024 21:51:43 -0400 Understanding the connection between brain networks and cognitive deficits in psychotic disorders
自我引导认知行为治疗应用程序可减少年轻人的焦虑威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院的研究人员发现，一款名为 Maya 的自我引导认知行为治疗 (CBT) 应用程序可以显着减少面临心理健康挑战的年轻人的焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Self-guided-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-app-reduces-anxiety-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Self-guided-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-app-reduces-anxiety-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e88a3f-7786-4949-9e0e-faf3fa395c68 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 21:43:43 -0400 Self-guided cognitive behavioral therapy app reduces anxiety in young adults
